accountNotActivatedMsg: Your account has not been activated. Check your email for an activation link and try logging in again. If you cannot find the email we can resend it. Would you like another activation email to be sent?
activationEmailResentMsg: An activation email was sent to your email address successfully
attachmentsAtLeastOne: At least one attachment must be added
attachMediaFailed: Documents and images are disabled. Video is not supported
attachmentsTooLarge: Attachments are too large to upload
challengeFormOfflineError: You are offline and do not have the challenge form stored locally. Please go online to retrieve the form
changePasswordFailed: Sorry unable to change your password.
checkboxAtLeastOne: At least one checkbox must be checked
commentAddedAttachmentsError: Comment was added successfully but uploading attachments failed
commentAttachmentsError: Comment was saved but failed to add attachments
customValueAtLeastOne: At least one custom value must be selected
deleteCommentMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
deleteParentComment: This will remove any responses to it also.
discardDraftMsg: Are you sure you want to discard this draft?
errorInvalidUsernameOrPassword: Your email address or password is incorrect. Please check your details and try again.
errorNetworkRequestFailed: Unable to contact server. Please check you are connected to the internet.
errorDomainNotFound: We could not find that domain. Please check the domain and try again.
failedLoadingOfflineCustomValues: Failed to load offline custom field values
ideaAddedAttachmentsError: Idea was added successfully but uploading attachments failed
ideaAttachmentsError: Idea was saved but failed to add attachments to the idea
ideaUpdateAttachmentsError: Idea was updated successfully but uploading attachments failed
ideasSearchOffline: You are offline. Sorting and filtering functionality is limited. You can still search by idea ID.
ideaSavedAsDraftOnline: Idea "{0}" was saved as a draft online as the challenge is no longer accepting ideas.
keywordsAtLeastOne: At least one keyword is required
name: Name
offlineSyncIdeaChallengeSubmissionsDisab: Failed to sync offline idea as challenge is no longer accepting submissions
offlineSyncIdeaChallengeNotFound: Failed to sync offline idea as challenge no longer exists
outcomeAtLeastOne: At least one outcome must be added
passwordResetRequestSentMsg: An email has been sent containing further instructions to reset your password
passwordResetRequestError: Sorry unable to send password reset. Please check your details and try again.
problemCompletingSearch: There was a problem completing your search.
problemMoreResults: There was a problem retrieving more results.
registrationSuccessfulMsg: An email has been sent to your email address in order for you to activate your account
removeValue: Are you sure you want to remove this value?
searchOffline: You are offline. Search has been disabled.
signOutMsg: Are you sure you want to sign out of your account? Any actions taken offline will be lost.
teamMemberAtLeastOne: At least one team member must be added
unableToGetChallenges: Unable to retrieve challenges right now.
unableToGetCustomValues: Unable to retrieve custom values right now.
unableToGetRegistrationForm: Unable to retrieve the registration form for your domain. Please try again later.
unableToPublishDraft: Unable to publish draft as it does not exist

unexpectedError: Sorry an unexpected error has occurred
